commuterSim

Class Simulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • commuterSim.Simulator

  • public class Simulator
extends java.lang.Object
    The core of the simulation engine and some of the simulator tab GUI.
    Version:
    0.1, 06 May 2014
    Author:
    Richard Thomas

        Residents at each location

      • carsAccumByLoc

        private int[][] carsAccumByLoc
        Accumulated cars on road adjacent to this location (today + last few days). Allows us to smooth congestion using a "moving averager" function.

      • totalPopulation

        private int totalPopulation
        Population summed over all locations

        Moving average of number of total cars

        Whether to automatically randomly vary weather in sims (i.e. discourage cycling)

        Is it (bad weather) today?

        Is simulator run button currently depressed and sim running?

      • roadworksLocation

        private int roadworksLocation
        Residential location index where roadworks occurring. (This will affect all residents at that location and commuting from further away).

        private int roadworksDaysLeft
        Number of days left for roadworks to complete

      • initSim

        public void initSim()
        (Re-)Initialise all simulator state and randomly regenerate population counts per location and their usual modes of transport.

      • resetSim

        private void resetSim()
        (Re-)set simulator time to day 0. Ensure that if only setup function is called that the initial simulation setup is exactly the same as the last time (including rand seed if specified in configuration preferences)

      • simStep

        private void simStep()
        Step simulator on by 1 day (Also called for "run" mode with runActive set).
